text: Verglas may refer to: * Verglas Music, a record label which has released works such as Jabberwocky, a 1999 progressive rock album * Verglas, a climbing term referring to a thin coating of glaze ice on rock (also of common usage in French) * Antoine Verglas (born 1962), photographer of models such as those painted by Joanne Gair, and of singers such as Gloria Estefan * Petit Verglas, first novel of Riad Sattouf, a French writer and cartoonist it:Vetrato pl:Gołoledź
title: Verglas
